Amateur Athletics
lead_paragraph: A year ago, Jennings made a point — and about $1.2 million — by choosing to skip college basketball and spend a season playing professionally in Italy before entering the N.B.A. draft.
snippet: A year ago, Jennings made a point — and about $1.2 million — by choosing to skip college basketball and spend a season playing professionally in Italy before entering the N.B.A. draft.
